All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CantLoadDataException
Custom exception thrown when trying load data from a source and something fails

Controller class for the CountriesPane view

Class used to store information about a country

CountryNotValidException
Custom exception thrown when trying to create a country with an invalid code

Controller class for the DashboardPane view
DuplicatedException
Custom exception thrown when trying to add an object to a list that already contains it

Launcher
 
MainApplication

Controller class for the main view
NoSelectionException
Custom exception thrown when trying to access a selection where the needed selection have not been made

Class used to contain information about a provider

Controller class for the ProviderCard view
ProviderNotValidException
Custom exception thrown when trying create a provider with wrong arguments

Utility class to make HTTP requests.

Static class to handle the search of a service

Selection

Class used to store information about a service
